attributes.action: Create the 2007 Royal Variety Show solely from contestants from the ITV show "Britain's Got Talent"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of the usual line up of big names and frankly boring entertainers, allow this years show cast to be made up entirely of the unknown performers from ITV's "Britain's Got Talent". Many of these people have shown that they have more than enough entertainment value and surely Her Majesty and the Royal Family would enjoy a show made up entirely of her loyal subjects.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
